oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cairo [Garden City and Mounira]
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Egypt. Maṣlaḥat al-Misāḥah
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Map of the Garden City and Mounira neighborhoods in Cairo, including Ministry of Education complex. Map was first surveyed in 1912 and published ni 1913. This map is a reprint in 1915 with small corrections. Sheet 41-F; 619
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cairo (Egypt) -- Maps
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; the American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: This item is in the public domain.
